about_the_game:
Axiom Alternative is an independently written alternative view of the Welcome To... Chichester series.

This demo contains the six chapters, whereby the protagonist gets a phone call; work problems abound and a visit to the local hotel does not go as planned
detailed_description:
Axiom Alternative is an independently written alternative view of the Welcome To... Chichester series.

This demo contains the six chapters, whereby the protagonist gets a phone call; work problems abound and a visit to the local hotel does not go as planned
legal_notice:
Story by Redewaan Duckett
Background graphics by Mustikadewia
Character designs by Larvinlucas
Music by Rafael Krux; Kevin MacLeod; Otis Galloway; Otis Galloway; Alexander Nakarada; Sascha Ende; OTOGOYA and Luca Fraula

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Lastest version of Ubuntu/Steam OS
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo or later
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 or later
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version: 10.6+
  • Processor: CPU: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Version: 10.6+
  • Processor: CPU: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible

name: Axiom Alternative Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher.
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL or DirectX compatible
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible

short_description: Axiom Alternative is an independently written alternative view of the Welcome To... Chichester series.
